flavor: For a proper setting, place the deadly fork after the salad fork, but before the dinner fork.
howToEarn: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToEarnGolden: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
name: Deadly Fork
text: Deathrattle: Add a 3/2 weapon to your hand.
